title: FS: T206 Old Mill Gandil SGC 10/1
author: Epps

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Old Mill Gandil SGC 10/1
posts.post_content:
For sale is a very tough T206 Old Mill Chick Gandil SGC 10/1. Gandil is one of the elusive 12 that is almost impossible to find with the Old Mill back and this is probably the toughest Gandil back to locate. $750 Delivered. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or offers.

$750 Delivered
